topic.title: Response
topic.shortdesc: These are possible responses to the xmen PUT request.

p.codeblock: # RESPONSE 200 OK { "id": 4" "name": "Hisako Ichiki", "heroName": "Armor", "power": "Psionic exoskeleton armor", "debut": "Astonishing X-Men #4 (2004)", "creator": "Joss Whedon, John Cassaday" }
